name: MFA Financial, Inc.
description: MFA Financial, Inc. is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on investing in residential mortgage assets. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in New York City, MFA operates primarily in the mortgage-backed securities market, seeking to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns to its investors. The company invests in a range of mortgage-related assets, including agency and non-agency mortgage-backed securities, mortgage loans, and other related financial instruments. MFA employs a careful investment strategy aimed at capital preservation and income generation, leveraging its experienced management team and robust risk management practices. By utilizing a combination of quantitative analysis and fundamental research, MFA aims to navigate the complexities of the mortgage market while maximizing shareholder value. The company is committed to transparency and strong corporate governance, providing regular updates to its investors about its portfolio performance and market outlook. MFA Financial is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol MFA.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
